Title: Relates to tax lien foreclosure
Summary: Relates to tax lien foreclosure; establishes senior, disabled, and veteran homeowner real property tax assistance program; establishes installment plans for certain real property taxes.
LawCode: Amd §§1142, 1104, 1146 & 972, add §1149, RPT L; add §97-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law and the social services law, in relation to tax lien foreclosure
